# The `VPDerivedIVRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe for converting the input value <code>IV</code> value to the corresponding value of an IV with different start and step values, using Start + IV &#42; Step. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPDerivedIVRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A recipe for converting the input value <code>IV</code> value to the corresponding value of an IV with different start and step values, using Start + IV &#42; Step.

Definition at line 3413 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
